name: Student Council
description: The Student Council represents the voice of students and works to improve campus life through various initiatives and events.

positions.title: President
positions.description: Lead the student council and represent students in college administration meetings

positions.title: Vice President
positions.description: Support the president and manage internal council operations

positions.title: Secretary
positions.description: Maintain records, manage communications, and coordinate meetings

name: Technical Committee
description: Organizes technical events, workshops, and competitions to enhance students' technical skills.

positions.title: Technical Head
positions.description: Lead technical initiatives and coordinate with industry professionals

positions.title: Workshop Coordinator
positions.description: Organize and manage technical workshops and training sessions

name: Cultural Committee
description: Organizes cultural events, festivals, and artistic activities to promote creativity and cultural diversity.

positions.title: Cultural Secretary
positions.description: Plan and execute cultural events and festivals

name: Sports Committee
description: Promotes sports activities, organizes tournaments, and manages athletic facilities.

positions.title: Sports Captain
positions.description: Lead sports activities and represent the college in inter-college competitions

positions.title: Event Coordinator
positions.description: Organize sports events and manage tournament logistics

name: Media Committee
description: Manages college media, social media presence, and documentation of events.

positions.title: Media Head
positions.description: Oversee all media activities and social media strategy

positions.title: Content Writer
positions.description: Create content for college publications and social media
